name: Christine Royce
role: Assassin and companionWarden of theSierra Madre(potential)

topics.topic_text: FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: It's time for us to part ways.
topics.response_text: [Christine raises an eyebrow.]

topics.topic_text: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
topics.response_text: [Christine narrows her eyes, then shrugs.]

topics.topic_text: Yes, I'm sure.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: I think we should travel together.
topics.response_text: [Christine glances at your companion, shakes her head, then raises her index finger.]

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: FollowersOverburdened
topics.response_text: [Christine puts her palm flat and lowers it to the ground, shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: FollowersStealthing
topics.response_text: [Christine crouches down.]

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: [Christine raises an eyebrow suspiciously.]

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: [Christine looks at you and waits.]

topics.topic_text: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
topics.response_text: [Christine narrows her eyes, nods.]

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: [Christine frowns, taps the back of her wrist, then circles her finger.]

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: Switch to a melee weapon.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods, and her stance changes slightly.]

topics.topic_text: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
topics.response_text: [Christine raises an eyebrow, then shrugs.]

topics.topic_text: I want you to use ranged weapons.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods, closes one eye and slowly pulls an invisible trigger.]

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: [Christine tilts her head slightly.]

topics.topic_text: Stay close to me.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods, makes a half circle with her hand.]

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods, waits.]

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods, adjusts her gear.]

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Be patient, I'm going.{To herself but chiding the player}Maybe{emph}you should know when to let go.{Christine is walking to the Vault Elevator, asks player to be patient. This is a single bark to prevent breaking scripted sequence.}

topics.topic_text: I need you to go down to the manual bypass room to regulate the power.
topics.response_text: [Christine glances at the elevator, her expression becomes worried, then she looks back at you, then reluctantly shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: That's our captor. He likes giving orders.
topics.response_text: [She circles her finger around the Fountain and moves her fingers and thumb together rapidly, as if talking.]

topics.topic_text: I dealt with the others, and I've got the key phrase.
topics.response_text: {Slight surprise}Surprised that Super Mutant didn't eat you...{under her breath}and don't get me started on Dean.

topics.topic_text: This place... I'm not sure, it doesn't feel like a casino. Not entirely.
topics.response_text: I know. The sealed doors, the security... it's almost a fortress. Think that's why we're being ordered to come here and crack it open?

topics.topic_text: All right, come with me.
topics.response_text: {Player has no companion, Christine comes along.}[Christine nods, and steps slightly behind you, waiting.]

topics.topic_text: Your voice... is that the Starlet's voice?
topics.response_text: {Cold}Guess the Sierra Madre healed me.{Dismissive}It doesn't matter, and to be honest, I miss{emph}my voice.

topics.topic_text: Does that Auto-Doc there work?
topics.response_text: {Glances at medical computer}Yeah, still functional. Lot of garbage data on it, its basic procedures should still work fine.

topics.topic_text: Anything you can download off of it?
topics.response_text: {Slightly impressed}Looks like you got almost everything, not much more{emph}I can extract...{slight smile}"doctor."{Not mocking at the end, she's impressed, means "doctor" as a casual compliment.}

topics.topic_text: {Act 3}I had some questions I wanted to ask you.
topics.response_text: {Nods}All right.{Beat}Just glad I can{emph}answer you now.

topics.topic_text: Can the Auto-Doc heal your scars?
topics.response_text: {Slight frustration}No... they run a lot deeper than that.

topics.topic_text: You said you got off lucky?
topics.response_text: {Unpleasant memories, cont.}Yeah... I saw records of other "patients," and what had been done to them. Some couldn't hear anything but static. Others, just... gibbering wrecks.

topics.topic_text: Elijah didn't put you in the Auto-Doc... Dean did.
topics.response_text: {Emph, incredulous}Dean?{Beat, echoing disbelief}Dean{Emph}Domino?

topics.topic_text: The elevator to the vault is here, too.
topics.response_text: {Recognition, matter-of-fact}The elevator to the casino vault is here. In the starlet's room? That seems intimate.

topics.topic_text: I dealt with the other two in our team, now I need you to open something.
topics.response_text: What?{Frowns}Open something...{beat}my voice. That's why it's hers... someone wanted to use me as a key.

topics.topic_text: How long have you been hunting him?
topics.response_text: Too long. Thought I might have had a chance to settle it before this event happened, but then the chance slipped away again.

topics.topic_text: You could have said something sooner.
topics.response_text: {Reluctant}Wasn't sure until now I could trust you. Now I know.{< voice is restored. Christine says she didn't know who she could trust. Thinks player is worth keeping around. >}

topics.topic_text: Sounds personal.
topics.response_text: He... cut me off from someone I cared about a long time ago. He used his status to break us apart. So I had to find a new purpose, same banner.

topics.topic_text: He wasn't trying to torture you, he needed to alter your voice to use an audio-lock.
topics.response_text: To the vault... of course.{Nods}That makes sense.

topics.topic_text: You sound like the woman in the Sierra Madre broadcast.
topics.response_text: {Confused}Do I?{Shakes head}It sounds off to my ears... hard to tell. Not to mention it... hurts like hell to swallow.

topics.topic_text: All right, let me see if I can find another way to do this without sending you down there.
topics.response_text: [Christine smiles slightly in relief, and nods. She opens her mouth slightly, then closes it, frustrated.]

topics.topic_text: <Lie> We'll take the elevator up, see if there's another way to do this. After you.
topics.response_text: [Christine smiles slightly in relief, and moves to the elevator.]

topics.topic_text: Settle it? You're here to kill him.
topics.response_text: {Cold}Those are my orders. I've seen what he's done, and I believe in those orders.

topics.topic_text: I've found a way to do the bypass from here. You should be able to just use the terminal over there.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods gratefully. She glances in the direction of the terminal, looks at you, smiles, gives a thumbs up.]

topics.topic_text: I don't have time for this. Get in the damn elevator.
topics.response_text: [Christine shakes her head, more insistently this time. She points at the elevator, then downwards, then holds herself tightly and shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: Are you all right?
topics.response_text: [She looks at you, blinks again, then opens her mouth - but nothing comes out.]

topics.topic_text: Look, I'm here to help.
topics.response_text: [She looks shaken. As she glances at the Auto-Doc, she recoils, and her mouth opens - but again, nothing comes out.]

topics.topic_text: This isn't what it looks like.
topics.response_text: [The woman opens her mouth again, winces, then frowns and drags a finger across her throat in a slow motion. She looks more angry than pained now.]

topics.topic_text: Don't do that!
topics.response_text: [She looks surprised. Then notices your collar, and raises an eyebrow.]

topics.topic_text: Let's just say we're in this together.
topics.response_text: [She frowns, narrows her eyes, then slowly shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: Those facial scars weren't done by the Auto-Doc - the throat scar was.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods... slowly, then puts her hand in front her throat, closes it slowly, then points at you.]

topics.topic_text: What do you mean by that?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head again and draws a line in the air between the two of you.]

topics.topic_text: Look, together we can get out of this.
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head - once, then crosses her arms.]

topics.topic_text: I had questions I wanted to ask.
topics.response_text: [Christine glances straight up, frowns, then turns back to you and taps her wrist.]

topics.topic_text: {After asking 1 Q}I had other questions.
topics.response_text: [She looks exasperated, then waves her hand in a circle in front of her.]

topics.topic_text: Looks like someone set the bone saws to run random.
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head... then pauses, and shakes her head again, then looks exasperated.]

topics.topic_text: I don't understand why they shaved you bald.
topics.response_text: [Christine looks blankly at you. Then touches her head, smiles, then shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: Wait, the Auto-Doc didn't shave you bald?
topics.response_text: [She waves her hand, then shakes her head - she then nods in the direction of the casino.]

topics.topic_text: No, wait, I want to hear this. You were bald before?
topics.response_text: [She nods with an exasperated look, then makes a circle with her hands, repeats it twice more, then raises her hands and waves them like wings.]

topics.topic_text: [BOS] You were a Brotherhood of Steel Scribe?
topics.response_text: [She nods. She looks impressed.]

topics.topic_text: How the hell did you get out here?
topics.response_text: [She shrugs. Then she points to you and shrugs.]

topics.topic_text: Were you researching something?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: The Auto-Doc didn't do that?
topics.response_text: [She touches one of the scars on her cheeks, shakes head. Then touches the scar on her neck, and nods.]

topics.topic_text: So the Auto-Doc cut your voice box, not your scalp.
topics.response_text: [Christine nods.]

topics.topic_text: I can't restore your voice, we'd need a real Auto-Doc to do that.
topics.response_text: [She shivers slightly, and shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: You think he's using the Pip-Boy? To establish the projector connection?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, and raises her hands, palms facing each other, then rotates in a 180 degree arc and back again.]

topics.topic_text: Wait... that's a Brotherhood of Steel symbol, right? You're a Scribe?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, looks impressed.]

topics.topic_text: How did you get to the main gate? Then get here?
topics.response_text: {Deliver this angrier, seems like a dupe, isn't}The Gala went off, the Switching Station opened up - thought the screeching in the Auto-Doc was bad, Station worse.

topics.topic_text: Where were you before?
topics.response_text: [She moves her finger in a wider circle, then raises her hand over her eyes.]

topics.topic_text: Maybe it was a trust issue? He built this place for her, it feels like.
topics.response_text: {Skeptical}It's possible. This place is immense... and it still has power, food dispensers, security... was it all for Pre-War guests?{Beat}Or for her?

topics.topic_text: How did you end up in the Auto-Doc?
topics.response_text: [She moves her finger in a circle, frowns, then drags her hand down over her eyes. She raises them again, points to you.]

topics.topic_text: I let you out of the Auto-Doc. I can put you back in there just as fast.
topics.response_text: [Her eyes widen, and her eyes gauge yours. She then touches her wounds, and her expression crumbles into anger, as if defeated. She slowly nods.]

topics.topic_text: I have no idea, let's unlock it. The phrase is contained in the lyrics to a song.
topics.response_text: {Nods}All right.{Cold, she knows she may be trapping the player down here}If you go down there, are you prepared... what if you don't come back?{Christine is asking, because she knows that Elijah will show up, and when he does, she's going to suicide and kill him.}

topics.topic_text: Glad we understand each other. Let's go.
topics.response_text: {Player has no companion. Christine comes along.}[Christine narrows her eyes slightly. She slowly nods, then steps slightly behind you.]

topics.topic_text: I've got you to come down after me, it'll respond to your voice.
topics.response_text: {Evasive}I... just wanted to make sure you're ready. When you go down there, that may be it for us... we won't be needed anymore.

topics.topic_text: Fine. Would hate to have carved you up anymore than you are.
topics.response_text: [Christine's defeated expression vanishes into a stone-faced glare.]

topics.topic_text: It's a decayed speaker. If we stay too long near one, it'll go off.
topics.response_text: [She taps the collar and then opens and closes her hand really fast.]

topics.topic_text: I believe he loved her, wanted to protect her. Too much.
topics.response_text: {To herself}Love makes people do strange things.{Beat, quiet}Won't argue that. It can drive you crazy sometimes if you can't... connect.

topics.topic_text: Get going. I'll meet you at the Fountain in the center of the Villa.
topics.response_text: {Christine goes to the fountain.}[Christine gives a brief nod, then turns and begins to walk.]

topics.topic_text: Look, I'm not trying to order you. But your life is tied to mine.
topics.response_text: [She frowns, glances at the collar, looks back at you. She makes a circle with her hands, puts her hand over her eyes and squints.]

topics.topic_text: You're looking for something else. Fine, I can help.
topics.response_text: [She studies you again, then her expression softens slightly. She shakes her head slowly, and gives a silent sigh.]

topics.topic_text: He said he knew you.
topics.response_text: He saw me, before the scars, at a place far from here. It's where he found some of the technology he uses now.

topics.topic_text: I found the phrase for elevator's audio lock.
topics.response_text: {Curious}You did?{Impressed}Looks like even the Old World can't keep you out when you've got a mind to get in.

topics.topic_text: He knew Elijah? How?
topics.response_text: No idea. A courier. Wore an Old World flag on his back. He was the one who pulled me out there, told me where Elijah had gone.

topics.topic_text: Sympathized? Why?
topics.response_text: He said he understood what it meant to track someone who had such a... impact on his past life.

topics.topic_text: There's a chance he'll see reason.
topics.response_text: {Disgusted}Try and reason with him, see what happens. He's so lost in his technology, I don't think he even understands why anymore.

topics.topic_text: You'll have to wait just a little longer.
topics.response_text: {Slight irritation}Fine.{Warning player}I hear my collar beeping though, I've got the route to the exit all mapped out.

topics.topic_text: Are you going to be okay here?
topics.response_text: [She nods... then gestures at your hand, offers hers.]

topics.topic_text: <Take her hand.>
topics.response_text: [She holds it, meeting your eyes intently for a few moments. She gives your hand a gentle squeeze, then releases it and smiles slightly.]

topics.topic_text: Not in a hand-holding mood right now.
topics.response_text: [She frowns, then waves you away and focuses on the terminal.]

topics.topic_text: All right, be ready.
topics.response_text: [She narrows her eyes, determined, and gives a last nod.]

topics.topic_text: I don't understand.
topics.response_text: [She tries to open her mouth and nothing comes out. Her eyes narrow and her hands ball into fists.]

topics.topic_text: I'll be back for you, okay?
topics.response_text: [Christine tilts her head slightly, glances at your collar, then your Pip-Boy. She opens her mouth, frowns, then closes it.]

topics.topic_text: {Terrifying Presence}Get in that elevator or I'll make those scars on your face a pleasant memory.
topics.response_text: [Christine takes a step back from your gaze... her eyes widen in alarm, she takes one step, then two toward the elevator.]

topics.topic_text: What's wrong?
topics.response_text: [Christine studies the elevator frame, raises her hands... then sets them down... then raises them up again.]

topics.topic_text: [Perception] It reminds you of being trapped in the Auto-Doc.
topics.response_text: [She turns to you, relieved, and nods... then she turns away, and her face crumbles. She makes motions with her fingers, then clenches her fists.]

topics.topic_text: I have no idea what your problem is.
topics.response_text: [Her face becomes angry. She points at the elevator, points downward, then wraps her arms around her and shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: That's what I'm counting on.
topics.response_text: {To herself}"Begin again, but know when to let go."{Shakes head, skeptical}Let's see what happens.{Christine now knows what she needs to say at the Vault Elevator. She will start heading toward it at the end of the sentence, to bark the password i}

topics.topic_text: {Know about mission}He'll come here, to the Suites - when he does, let him go through.
topics.response_text: I... can't let him leave here. Look, you've done so much, and he's not going to show himself until you go down there.

topics.topic_text: That's why you're waiting. You're going to kill him.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I...

topics.topic_text: Do you trust me? If you do, let go of this.
topics.response_text: I can't let go. Every time I've thought about it...

topics.topic_text: If he kills you, I won't be able to get out.
topics.response_text: I know. And he{pause}will kill me, I can't get the collar off. Even if I could, I need to be sure - see his eyes, his face, when he dies.

topics.topic_text: Let him come through the suites, follow me. If he escapes, you'll still be here, waiting.
topics.response_text: {Quiet}You have to promise me. Promise me you'll deal with him... if I see him, I...

topics.topic_text: If you try and kill him, I can't let you do it. If you die, you'll kill us both.
topics.response_text: {Quiet}I can't. It's my mission, has been.{Beat}This has to be done.

topics.topic_text: Then I need to keep you from doing it.
topics.response_text: I... I didn't want this to happen.{Sighs}Ending him is more important than saving you. For what it's worth... I'm sorry.

topics.topic_text: Christine, please, let go of this. Let me deal with him.
topics.response_text: {Hopeful, slight}All right. All right, I'll...{frowns}but I'll need to leave this floor. He'll pick up my collar, and...

topics.topic_text: Don't tell me where you're going - I'll find you after this.
topics.response_text: {Nods, sighs}I...{takes a breath}never mind. Let me get the vault open...{To herself, slowly, quiet as if memorizing it}"Begin again... but know when to let go."{Slight rueful laugh, to player}Sounds like you.{Say this a little tenderly, the player just talked her down from suicide, and Christine's found new purpose.}

topics.topic_text: You can dampen the signal somehow?
topics.response_text: [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]

topics.topic_text: You can interfere with the Speaker's detonation frequency somehow?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]

topics.topic_text: Does that work with any other collar?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, slowly shakes her head - she opens her mouth, then makes the motion of tuning a dial, then points at herself.]

topics.topic_text: Got it, let's move on.
topics.response_text: [She nods, and motions for you to go ahead.]

topics.topic_text: It's just your frequency.
topics.response_text: [She nods, once, then again, points at the two of you, then the Pip-Boy.]

topics.topic_text: You can interfere with the detonation signal from the speakers?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]

topics.topic_text: Great. How romantic.
topics.response_text: [She looks puzzled for a second, then glares at you and motions you to move on.]

topics.topic_text: He leaves audio logs, too.
topics.response_text: [Christine holds out her hand, and motions at your Pip-Boy.]

topics.topic_text: <Show her the Pip-Boy.>
topics.response_text: [Christine studies the Pip-Boy intently, turning your arm around as if your wrist's a sensor module she just found.]

topics.topic_text: What? What do you want?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, and snaps her fingers at your Pip-Boy.]

topics.topic_text: I don't want you messing with this.
topics.response_text: [Christine snarls, makes a dismissive wave, and goes back to studying the Fountain intently - then looks at the casino, then the Fountain again.]

topics.topic_text: Do you know what those machines around the Villa are?
topics.response_text: [Christine shakes her head, then pauses, and makes a small circle with her thumb and forefinger.]

topics.topic_text: Careful, that's my arm, all right?
topics.response_text: [Her finger stabs through the red buttons, narrowing in on the local map. She scrolls to the Sierra Madre's main gate, frowns, backs out.]

topics.topic_text: You sure seem eager to go.
topics.response_text: [She points at the Fountain, then at your Pip-Boy... pauses, then points at her collar, then yours.]

topics.topic_text: Why do you think he wants you to go the Puesta del Sol Switching Station?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, then makes a motion as if typing at keys... then she points at you, raises her left wrist and pantomimes talking into it.]

topics.topic_text: Neither Dean or Dog have the technical aptitude to man the Switching Station?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She slowly nods, looks impressed.]

topics.topic_text: I don't know what you're talking about.
topics.response_text: [She sighs silently, then shakes her head and motions to the West.]

topics.topic_text: I don't have any Sierra Madre Chips on me.
topics.response_text: [She nods, then waits.]

topics.topic_text: Think he might be close, then. Any idea where?
topics.response_text: [She surveys the area, focusing upwards. She glances at the casino, frowns. She then looks West, then East.]

topics.topic_text: You make a pretty lousy transmitter, you know.
topics.response_text: [She glares at you. After a second, she pauses, and smiles slightly, shaking her head. She then makes a circle of the skyline with her finger.]

topics.topic_text: Here's a Sierra Madre Chip. I'll need that back.
topics.response_text: [She examines the chip for a second, raises it to her eye, then turns it to the side, gauging its diameter and width.]

topics.topic_text: You want... a small circle?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: We really don't have time for magic tricks right now.
topics.response_text: [She frowns, shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: You can... scrounge more somehow.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]

topics.topic_text: I don't understand.
topics.response_text: [She frowns, looks frustrated for a moment, thinking.]

topics.topic_text: You can make more of those at a Workbench. With the right materials.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]

topics.topic_text: <Storage Line. Do not translate.>
topics.response_text: Thought you'd leave me in that elevator?{Slow anger, remembering how the player trapped her}I haven't forgotten what you did in the Switching Station, not for a second.

topics.topic_text: You need a battery... a Fission Battery... and Scrap Metal? And you can counterfeit the chips?
topics.response_text: [She nods, impressed. Then she points at you, then her and makes a circle.]

topics.topic_text: Can you teach me how to do it?
topics.response_text: [She nods. She then makes a series of hand motions to represent weight and amounts - enough so you think you could do it on your own.]

topics.topic_text: What are you planning to do?
topics.response_text: When we first met, I thought I recognized the collar technology. Just needed some time to experiment with it.

topics.topic_text: You've had your voice back for only a little while, and I'm already sick of listening to you.
topics.response_text: {Cold, determined}Silence suits me fine. When your master shows, I'll deal with him, too.{< Christine talks smack back and starts the fight. "Master" is delivered with disgust.>}

topics.topic_text: You found a way to modify the collar's radio frequency.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I did. And it means I can control your movements.

topics.topic_text: You can modify the detonator signal. I don't see how that helps you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, it helps... as long as I need to control your movements.

topics.topic_text: What are you talking about?
topics.response_text: You'll find out.

topics.topic_text: Can't you communicate some other way? Can you write?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [Christine frowns, then pauses and traces one of the scars on her head with her finger.]

topics.topic_text: There'll be a second or two of lag while you switch it. That's long enough for me to kill you.
topics.response_text: {Slightly uneasy, player is right}We'll see. I don't think you're gonna have the time.

topics.topic_text: You know I didn't put you in the Auto-Doc, right?
topics.response_text: You, Elijah... it doesn't matter. Both of you have run out of places to hide.

topics.topic_text: We're inside the casino. We don't need to fight anymore, it's useless.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] No, I believe you. All along, you were watching out for yourself. I understand.{A little softer here, for a second, Christine is going to pass along some wisdom before the player dies.}

topics.topic_text: I didn't put you in that Auto-Doc. Dean did.
topics.response_text: {Disbelieving}Dean?{Emph}He put me in there? No, I don't believe it. He didn't have any reason to torture me. You, on the other hand...

topics.topic_text: He wasn't trying to torture you, he needed to alter your voice to use an audio-lock.
topics.response_text: An audio-lock to where?{Beat, recognizes what happened}To the Sierra Madre vault. It's voice-activated. And he wanted in.

topics.topic_text: Something to do with the surgery.
topics.response_text: [She pauses, then draws a jagged symbol like electricity in the air, then puts on an odd, staring face.]

topics.topic_text: So... brain damage, or...?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head... then stops, as if thinking.]

topics.topic: NVDLC01ChristineDialogueNVDLC01ChristineTopic180Why... would someone remove your ability to write, or...
topics.topic_text: That's a specific form of brain surgery using electrodes. Pre-War.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, slowly, and then makes the motion of typing and drawing X's and lines in the air, and then gives a thumbs up.]

topics.topic_text: You can still do math, that's good to hear.
topics.response_text: [She nods, smiles.]

topics.topic_text: You can still do numbers and calculations.
topics.response_text: [She nods.]

topics.topic_text: You were knocked out?
topics.response_text: [She nods. She raises an eyebrow, points at you, makes a circle, then points at your feet.]

topics.topic_text: He's broadcasting from the casino.
topics.response_text: [Christine looks at you, frowns. Then glances at the casino, her eyes narrowed. She stops breathing for a second, as if holding it in.]

topics.topic_text: You really want to get to him, don't you.
topics.response_text: [She ignores you for a second, still staring at the casino. Then she glances at you, and her face and stance relax slightly.]

topics.topic_text: No, before we go any further, I need to know what the problem is.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks like she's about to shake her head, stops, and then puts her hand over her eyes and squints, as if staring in the distance.]

topics.topic_text: Don't ignore me - your whole body language changed there.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{DUPE}[She looks like she's about to shake her head, stops, and then puts her hand over her eyes and squints, as if staring in the distance.]

topics.topic_text: Aren't you upset?
topics.response_text: {Grim, shakes head}I've... done worse. Much worse... and for more hopeless causes, and I will again.

topics.topic_text: You're looking for the man inside the casino.
topics.response_text: [She nods.]

topics.topic_text: Why are you looking for him?
topics.response_text: [She wrinkles her face, frowns, and looks angry. She touches her throat, traces the scar with her finger, then points the finger at the casino.]

topics.topic_text: You want to kill him.
topics.response_text: [She gives a nod. Then another nod, even slower.]

topics.topic_text: I'm fine with killing the son of a bitch. As long as we can torture him first.
topics.response_text: [She nods grimly. She seems satisfied.]

topics.topic_text: Could always slap a collar on him and let him run into a wall of speakers.
topics.response_text: [Christine's expression relaxes slightly, and she nods.]

topics.topic_text: I'd like to know why he did all this first and what's so important about the casino.
topics.response_text: [Christine's expression becomes furious, and she raises her hands, draws jagged lines in the air.]

topics.topic_text: I'm not out to kill anyone, I just want to get out of here.
topics.response_text: [Christine looks at you, then shakes her head, points at your collar, then the front gate and shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: I don't care. I'd rather reason with someone first than simply kill them.
topics.response_text: [She then slowly shakes her head and draws an "X" in the air.]

topics.topic_text: He came this way for a reason, and I want to know why.
topics.response_text: [She then slowly shakes her head and draws an "X" in the air.]

topics.topic_text: I didn't bring you here.
topics.response_text: [She looks at you for a moment, studying you. She doesn't move. After a second or two, she frowns.]

topics.topic_text: Now... wait, you're acting like you don't trust me or something.
topics.response_text: [She continues to look at you for a moment, studying you, then her eyes fall to your collar, then your Pip-Boy.]

topics.topic_text: What? What about my feet?
topics.response_text: [She repeats the circling motion again. This time, she lowers her hand and circles her finger inward, until she's pointing at the spot between you.]

topics.topic_text: You want to know how I got here?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]

topics.topic_text: Followed a radio signal here, a woman's voice.
topics.response_text: [She waits. After a second, she raises her eyebrow again.]

topics.topic_text: None of your business.
topics.response_text: [She shrugs, then taps the back of her palm in the direction of the Fountain.]

topics.topic_text: <Raise an eyebrow back.>
topics.response_text: [Almost against her will, she smiles. After a moment, the smile fades, and she points at the ground again.]

topics.topic_text: ...I was curious where it led.
topics.response_text: [She looks at you for a second, studying you. Then nods.]

topics.topic_text: Looking to start life as a Prospector, figured this place was a good place to start.
topics.response_text: [She frowns, puts her hands on her hips and glares at you. After a second, she rolls her eyes.]

topics.topic_text: If I could leave, I would.
topics.response_text: [She looks at you for a moment, glances at your collar, shrugs. She then lightly grabs her neck with both hands, holds it for a moment.]

topics.topic_text: Me? What about you?
topics.response_text: [She slowly shakes her head, then points at the ground.]

topics.topic_text: Are you saying it's one or the other?
topics.response_text: [She frowns. Glances in the direction of the casino, then the exit, then back in the direction of the casino.]

topics.topic_text: Do you know how to get out of here?
topics.response_text: [She points in the direction of the main gate. Then points at your collar, shakes her head, and locks her hands around her neck.]

topics.topic_text: So once the collars are gone, we can just leave?
topics.response_text: [She nods slowly, as if thinking. Then she raises an eyebrow, looks skeptical, then shrugs.]

topics.topic_text: You're saying it'll be difficult to return here if we leave.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She shakes her head, points at herself, then points at you, nods.]

topics.topic_text: You were over the moon?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head and rolls her eyes.]

topics.topic_text: ...to return here if I leave.
topics.response_text: [She nods.]

topics.topic_text: But not you.
topics.response_text: [She nods once.]

topics.topic_text: Why can't you find your way back?
topics.response_text: [She slowly shakes her head. She points at the ground, then moves each leg outward, straddling the place where she's pointing.]

topics.topic_text: You aren't going to leave.
topics.response_text: [She nods.]

topics.topic_text: So you're after the treasure then?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, shakes her head... pauses... then tilts her head slightly, nods slowly.]

topics.topic_text: Why would you want to stay here of all places?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, makes a mock motion of loading a gun, then hefting it to her shoulder and taking aim at something in the distance.]

topics.topic_text: You were... looking for something?
topics.response_text: [Shakes her head and makes a motion of two fingers walking.]

topics.topic_text: You want to kill something here, then protect this place.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks impressed, nods.]

topics.topic_text: Why do you want to do that?
topics.response_text: [She looks at you, as if surprised. Then glances at your collar, wrinkles her face, and points at it.]

topics.topic_text: You're worried someone's going to find this place? Use it to hurt people.
topics.response_text: [She nods slowly, hands still locked on her throat. She looks pained for a moment, and she breaks from your gaze.]

topics.topic_text: You can't protect the world from the world... it's useless.
topics.response_text: [She points at your collar, then hers, and shakes her head slowly... then cuts the air with her hand and her face becomes blank.]

topics.topic_text: I'm not the one trying to communicate with hand motions.
topics.response_text: [She gives you a snarl, glances at your collar, makes a dismissive wave.]

topics.topic_text: Things would be a lot easier if you did one snap for yes, two snaps for no.
topics.response_text: [She smiles humorlessly. She then nods once slowly. Then she shakes her head slowly.]

topics.topic_text: Okay, okay, I get it. <Nod slowly.> Better than finger snaps.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [Her face wrinkles more, and then she gives a reluctant smile.]

topics.topic_text: You were looking for someone?
topics.response_text: [She nods and raises a finger.]

topics.topic_text: A smile... now that's more like it.
topics.response_text: [Still smiling, she rolls her eyes, and then slowly taps the back of her wrist.]

topics.topic_text: You really need to relax. This entire place is a Pre-War paradise, you know.
topics.response_text: [She looks at you, surprised. Then she opens her mouth as if to laugh... silently.]

topics.topic_text: Look... we'll find a way to heal you, all right?
topics.response_text: [She doesn't look at you, continues to stare darkly in front of her.]

topics.topic_text: Wherever you were, it was hot out.
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head and rolls her eyes.]

topics.topic_text: This charades shit is driving me crazy.
topics.response_text: [She frowns and raises her middle finger.]

topics.topic_text: A robot?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head and pumps her fist near her chest.]

topics.topic_text: Man?
topics.response_text: [She nods. She makes a motion with her hands around her chin, drawing it down, and then she raises her hands and clenches them at the sky.]

topics.topic_text: Or a woman?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head... then stops mid-way, frowns... then tilts her head, as if thinking. She seems lost in thought for a moment.]

topics.topic_text: An... angry, bearded... man.
topics.response_text: {SCRIPT: Knows that Elijah is in Pip-Boy}[She points at your Pip-Boy.]

topics.topic_text: You were looking for a man in a Vault.
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head, points at your Pip-Boy again.]

topics.topic_text: You were looking for a Vault Boy?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head, points at your Pip-Boy again and makes a talking motion with her hand.]

topics.topic_text: Someone smart.
topics.response_text: [She nods, then circles her ear.]

topics.topic_text: ...and nuts.
topics.response_text: [She nods, frowns.]

topics.topic_text: Sounds like it's pretty important to you to find this person.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] [She frowns, raises two fingers, and has them walk together. Then she looks down on the two fingers, and her face becomes angry.]

topics.topic_text: I don't understand.
topics.response_text: [She repeats the chopping motion, slower, then draws the two fingers apart. She looks sadly at one of the fingers.]

topics.topic_text: He cut you off from someone.
topics.response_text: [She nods.]

topics.topic_text: Family? Husband?
topics.response_text: [She frowns, shakes her head, and even more so at husband.]

topics.topic_text: Oh - girlfriend.
topics.response_text: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]

topics.topic_text: Uh... boyfriend?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: What, your wife?
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head, but rolls it side to side.]

topics.topic_text: Oh - girlfriend.
topics.response_text: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]

topics.topic_text: Oh- girlfriend.
topics.response_text: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]

topics.topic_text: You were more than girlfriends - lovers.
topics.response_text: [She nods, and looks at you a little surprised.]

topics.topic_text: Unrequited? Or...
topics.response_text: [She shakes her head, draws the two fingers together, then shakes her head more emphatically.]

topics.topic_text: What, you think I don't understand love?
topics.response_text: [She raises an eyebrow, looks at you.]

topics.topic_text: I understand how important a loved one can be.
topics.response_text: [She nods slowly, studying you. She seems to be gauging you again.]

topics.topic_text: How did you get here from the Gala Event? And onto this floor?
topics.response_text: {Deliver this slow, thoughtful, seems like a dupe, isn't}The Gala went off, the Switching Station opened up -{to herself, rueful}thought the screeching in the Auto-Doc was bad, Station worse.

topics.topic_text: What weapons are you skilled at?
topics.response_text: [Christine draws a jagged lightning bolt in the air, pantomimes throwing a grenade, and then pulls an imaginary knife from behind her back.]

topics.topic_text: Energy Weapons, Explosives, Melee, Unarmed, and Guns. Is that all?
topics.response_text: [She nods. Once.]

topics.topic_text: You seem like you've been well-trained.
topics.response_text: [She shrugs slightly, then waits.]

topics.topic_text: Oh, is that all? Guess that'll do.
topics.response_text: [She makes a disapproving frown, shakes her head.]

topics.topic_text: So after your speech about control, now you're going to use the collars like Elijah did?
topics.response_text: {Frowns, slow}You know what... you're right. I don't need to use the same methods to kill you, and I shouldn't... it would make me as bad as Elijah is.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ChristineSpeaker
topics.response_text: [Christine stops, glances at the speaker, then glances at your collar, frowning.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ChristineVaultHelpTopic01
topics.response_text: {Breaks into player's frequency while he's being blasted with turrets, urgency}Seeing what I can do to shut those turrets down from up here... come on... come on...{<AUDIO: From player's bomb collar. Christine tells the player that she's trying to bring the Vault's turrets down.>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ChristineVaultHelpTopic02
topics.response_text: ...got it, two of 'em down... can't shut down the others - he's cut off access.{frustrated}Dammit!{Beat, cold}Put him down, bury him - whatever it takes!{<Christine succeeds in hampering the Vault's security turrets.><Christine lets the player know that two turrets are now disabled. She urges the pla}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01SuitesChristineVaultPasswordBark
topics.response_text: {Hesitates, big moment}"Begin again -{slightly quieter}but know when to let go."{Christine hesitates for a moment, preparing herself to speak the password to open the Vault Elevator. A pregnant pause, then she delivers.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DeanToChristineTopic01
topics.response_text: [Christine studies Dean, frowns.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DeanToChristineTopic02
topics.response_text: [Christine frowns, tilts her head slightly.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DeanToChristineTopic03
topics.response_text: [Christine's eyes narrow.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ETChristineSpeakerBark
topics.response_text: [Christine taps her collar, makes a sweeping gesture at the area, then begins to pulse her fingers outward, faster and faster.]{She's indicating speakers may be nearby.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ETChristineVendBark
topics.response_text: [Christine nods at the Vending Machine, then makes a sweeping gesture with both arms and draws them to her chest.]{<After entering a room with a vending machine, Christine indicates to the player that it may be a good time to stock up on supplies>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01EndingChristine
topics.response_text: {Christine Dead: Narration}Christine, scarred by her hunt for Elijah and unable to let him go, perished in the Sierra Madre Casino.{This plays if Christine died. Even though narrating, keep this on the somber side.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01GalaEventActivate
topics.response_text: [You hear banging from the speaker, as if someone is hammering on a wall with their fists.]

topics.topic_text: Now, now... I'll let you out when the event's over. Maybe.
topics.response_text: [The hammering stops for a second... and there's one final bang from the speaker, as if someone is smashing their fist into a wall.]

topics.topic_text: Christine? We're almost ready here.
topics.response_text: [A single tap comes from the speaker, then silence.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01GodToChristineTopic01
topics.response_text: [Christine narrows her eyes, gets into a combat stance.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01GodToChristineTopic02
topics.response_text: [Christine frowns.]

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01WTChristineGalaBark
topics.response_text: [Christine flicks her finger back and forth quickly like a switch, then nods to the north.]{<Indicates to the player that the Switching Station is to the north>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01WTChristineRoofBark
topics.response_text: [Christine frowns, looks upward, then back at you. She nods her head upwards, then makes the motion of holding a gun at the ready.]{<Indicates that it might be safer to find higher ground>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01WTChristineSmallSpaceBark
topics.response_text: [Christine's eyes dart around at the walls and the ceiling. She glances at the exit, then takes a slow breath. Sweat appears on her brow.]{<When entering a small underground room Christine indicates that she doesn't like small spaces and would prefer to be above ground>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01WTChristineTerrifiedSoundBark
topics.response_text: [Christine's eyes dart in the direction of the screeching sound. She looks frightened and trembles slightly, as if fighting an urge to run.]

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: [Christine frowns, points at your collar, then hers.]

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: [Christine points at mine, then taps her temple.]

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: [Christine covers her ears.]

topics.topic_text: Just die, tired of listening to you anyway.
topics.response_text: {Cold, determined}Silence suits me fine. When your master shows, I'll deal with him, too.{< Christine talks smack back and starts the fight. "Master" is delivered with disgust.>}

topics.topic_text: What do you want to say?
topics.response_text: {Takes a breath}I've been hunting the one who hijacked your Pip-Boy, Elijah, for... some time.{< voice is restored. Christine tells the player about her mission to kill Elijah. >}

topics.topic_text: Just glad you're safe. Hold up here, I'll take care of Elijah.
topics.response_text: {Studies player, thinks the player is worth it}Good luck. He's... not an easy opponent. If I can, I'll help.{Beat, thinking}Might be able to figure something out using the Sierra Madre's computer systems.{< voice is restored. Christine wishes the player good luck and walks over to the intercom to disable security. >}

conversation.response_text: [Christine nods.]
[Christine stares at the headless corpses for a second. Then she makes a slow, angry scowl.]
[Christine sniffs the air, then touches her neck and frowns. She gestures at the air and taps her wrist.]
[Christine looks around, then nods toward a terminal on the far side of the room.]
[Christine points to an electrical box on the wall, and twists her hand.]
[Christine shakes her head as you approach the edge of the catwalk. She turns away from the catwalk and begins looking around.]
[Christine nods at the toxic cloud below, then makes a walking motion with her fingers and slowly shakes her head.]

{Coughs, getting her voice back}The quick... the quick scribe... jumped over the lazy paladin.{Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra}
[Christine's eyes narrow. She raises an index finger, as if listening, then points ahead grimly and pulls back an imaginary trigger.]
[Christine nods at you, then the Ghost Person on the ground, makes a neck-chopping motion.]
{Thinking, determined}Should be able to rewire them, failing that, shoot them,{beat, backpedals, slight frustration}although that'll alert the others, they're on a linked patrol pattern.
Leaving me in that goddamn elevator in the dark? You'll beg me to do the same to you while the Holograms are tracing lasers across your face.
[Christine studies the area, then the Police Station. She pretends to unload a weapon and holds up the imaginary cartridge, waving it.]
[Christine looks at the machine and frowns. She points at the narrow slot on the side and raises an eyebrow.]
[Christine motions to you, points at the door uneasily, then makes a pulling motion with her hand. She seems hesitant to go near it.]{<She is signaling this is where the event takes place.>}

{More military professional}All doors are locked down, security's activated - and emitter signals are lighting up all over this floor.{Beat, comes to a decision}I'll do what I can from here.{<Christine's is determined, building strength - she's going all military precision here, even with wounded voice.>}

{Pained}If it's who I think it is, this is Christine... recovered.{Starts getting voice back, surveying room, professional}In what looks like an Old World hotel room, high class, two rooms -{beat}exit's sealed.{<Christine's voice is a little ragged in this sequence, it just healed up.>}
{First bark}Need to reset this damn thing... switching the frequencies... come on, come on...
{Smug, player walked into a trap}That's it... signal frequency's hot, let's see how you deal with this.
{Under her breath, pissed}Think you can run? The longer you try and keep your distance, this scanning frequency will flush you out.

combat.response_text: [Christine checks herself, stops attacking, looks angry, points at collar.]
[Christine quickly taps what she's wearing, makes a hatchet motion.]
[Christine points at your collar, then hers.]
[Christine narrows her eyes, and her stance changes.]
[Christine makes frantic motions with her hands.]
[Christine taps herself, then waves her hand - she looks in pain.]
[Christine clutches her collar as she falls, clawing at it.]
[Christine waves for you to get back, makes throwing motion.]
[Christine shakes her head, waves at you to follow.]
[Christine's face peels back in a snarl.]
[Christine winces, then tries to hide it.]
[Christine winces, clutches her side.]
[Christine takes the blow, doesn't flinch.]
[Christine's eyes blank, and she falls.]
{TEMP: No line needed.}
[Christine taps her gun in frustration.]
[Christine begins to beat at the flames on her body.]
[Christine looks at you, touches her throat, frowns.]
{TEMP: Not sure needed. Power attack.}
[Christine blinks, takes a breath, then nods.]
[Christine narrows her eyes, then shakes her head and waves you off.]
[Christine checks herself, gives the thumbs up.]
[Christine shakes her head, gets quickly back on her feet.]
[Christine taps her weapon angrily, assumes defensive stance.]

description:
Christine Royce is a 32 year-old Human Female.

A former Brotherhood of Steel scribe turned assassin, Christine is a determined and technically skilled woman on a relentless hunt for Elder Elijah across the Mojave Wasteland. She stands at only 92% of normal human height, a fact that belies her fierce determination and resilience.

Christine Royce's Personality: Determined, resilient, and technically-minded with a strong sense of justice. Despite her suffering, she maintains focus on her goal of finding Elijah. She appears calm under pressure but carries deep emotional scars from her past.

Christine Royce's Backstory: Born and raised in the Brotherhood of Steel, Christine became a scribe. She entered into a lesbian relationship with Veronica Santangelo, despite the implicit homophobia of their culture. Their relationship was subsequently terminated due to this prejudice. Following this, Christine became fixated on hunting down Elder Elijah for his crimes across the wasteland. During her pursuit, she was captured and trapped in a facility, only to be rescued by Ulysses, who forced his way in using explosives. She eventually tracked Elijah to the derelict Sierra Madre Casino & Resort, where she was captured by the super mutant Dog, who was himself enslaved to Elijah. Fitted with an explosive collar, Christine had no choice but to aid Elijah in his attempt to break into the casino.
